roleset.name: to make pregnant, full with

role.descr: entity arg1 is pregnant with, baby

example.name: Sentiment baby, art woman
example.text: It suffices that I was not an exception among my compatriots, since this is a very Spanish characteristic, and [our art]-1, exponent of the Spanish spirit, was impregnated *-1 with these two sentiments.

roleset.note: Created by Claire. Frames file for 'impregnate' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2; adjectival 'pregnant' by Julia based on BOLT-6. Verbnet entry 9.8.

example.name: adjectival rel: pregnant; args 0, 1
example.text: Is the title of this thread "what would you do if your daughter was pregnant by a crackhead"?
